signals.core
Class Function

java.lang.Object
  signals.core.Function
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThumbnailProducer
Direct Known Subclasses:
MagPhaseFunction, RealImagFunction
public abstract class Function
extends java.lang.Object
implements ThumbnailProducer

Represents a 1D or 2D complex function in terms of real and imaginary parts or magnitude and phase.

Author:
Juliet

scalePrimaries

protected abstract void scalePrimaries(double scale)
Scales (and modifies) the input arrays assuming they have a given format E.g. if primaryB represents an imaginary part, it is multiplied by scale, but if it represents phase, it is not affected

Parameters:
primaryA - first primary array, representing real part or magnitude
primaryB - second primary array, reprensenting imaginary part or phase
scale - multiplier

scaleSecondaries

protected abstract void scaleSecondaries(double scale)
Scales (and modifies) the input arrays assuming they have a given format E.g. if secondaryB represents an imaginary part, it is multiplied by scale, but if it represents phase, it is not affected

Parameters:
secondaryA - first secondary array, representing real part or magnitude
secondaryB - second secondary array, reprensenting imaginary part or phase
scale - multiplier

updatePrimaries

public void updatePrimaries()
Uses flags to ensure that primary data is created, scaled, and shifted Ensures that if secondaries are listed as current, they are also properly scaled and shifted

updateSecondaries

public void updateSecondaries()
Creates secondary data from primary data, shifts and scales it correctly pre: primary data has alreay been created
